/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway is teeming with vehicles, including cars and trucks, adding a dynamic element to the image. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. In the distance, the iconic Great Wall of China can be seen, adding a historical touch to the modern cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the grandeur of the Great Wall. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, reflecting the lively atmosphere of the city.
